long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily record your Chrome tabs for free with the Free Screen Recorder! This simple-to-use extension allows you to capture the video and audio of any active tab and instantly download the recording to your computer.

Key features:

Completely Free: No hidden charges or subscription fees.
High-Quality Recordings: Record your active Chrome tab in HD (720p) with both video and audio.
Quick Downloads: Download recordings directly as .webm video files.
Simple Interface: Start and stop recordings with just one click!
Privacy-Friendly: Only records the content of your selected tab, nothing else.
Whether you're creating tutorials, capturing meetings, or saving video content, the Free Screen Recorder is your go-to tool for all your screen recording needs.

Detailed Instructions:
Install the Extension: Add the Free Screen Recorder to Chrome via the Chrome Web Store.
Start Recording:
Click the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar.
In the popup window, click the Start Recording button.
The extension will capture video and audio from your active tab.
Stop Recording:
To stop, click the Stop Recording button in the popup window.
The recording will automatically be downloaded as a .webm video file to your computer.
Donate: Support the development of this free tool by donating via the PayPal link in the popup window.
